'Python'
'# Get a handle to the workspace'
'ml_client = MLClient('

'resource_group_name="<RESOURCE_GROUP>",'
'workspace_name="<AML_WORKSPACE_NAME>",'
')'
"The result is a handler to the workspace that you'll use to manage other resources and"
'jos.'
'\xc2\xae Important'
